title: Morning Joe 3/30/21
description: As CDC Director, Dr. Rochelle Walensky, says she fears a rise in cases across the country, President Biden is asking Americans to 'do their part' and help slow the spread of the coronavirus. The Morning Joe panel discusses Biden's handling of messaging and contrasts with how former President Trump handled messaging.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
